item.description:
The Sea Dogs will host a "Green Night" at Hadlock Field, presented by Hannaford Supermarkets on Friday, August 12th when the Sea Dogs host the Erie SeaWolves (Tigers) at 7:00 PM.

Giveaway Item: The first 1,000 fans to enter the ballpark will receive a reusable shopping bag, courtesy of Hannaford Supermarkets.

Ride Your Bike to the Game: Buy One Ticket, Get One Free with a Bike - The Sea Dogs are encouraging fans to ride their bikes to the game. Fans who ride their bikes to the ballpark will be able to take part in a special Buy One, Get One Free Ticket offer. Ride your bike straight up to the ticket window to make sure you get this fantastic offer.

Pre-Game Bike Parade: Fans who ride their bike to the game will be able to participate in a bike parade around the warning track. The Bike parade will start at 6:15 PM.

Hybrid Cars: Prime Motor Group will have a display of Hybrid Cars on the front plaza.

Green Tips: Throughout the game, the Sea Dogs will be posting helpful facts to make your homes and lifestyles more energy efficient and sustainable. These green tips will help fans reduce their personal carbon footprint and will help society improve on a more earth friendly way of life. Tickets: Tickets are available by calling the Sea Dogs Ticket Office at 207-879-9500 or order online.
item.name: Green Night [and bicycles!] with the Sea Dogs
